# buttonImage

**Instance Property**

The image displayed in the sharing service picker item button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var buttonImage: NSImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is a sharing service picker image.

## Configuring the appearance

- **buttonTitle**: The text displayed in the sharing service picker item button.
